mapper.insert:
INSERT INTO p_attendance_used (companyId,enumber,workHour,remainHours,timeRange,workDate,createTime, creatorId,lastUpdateTime,lastUpdatorId,msCreatorId,msLastUpdatorId) VALUES
(#{l.companyId},#{l.enumber},#{l.workHour},#{l.remainHours},#{l.timeRange},#{l.workDate},#{l.createTime}, #{l.creatorId},#{l.lastUpdateTime},#{l.lastUpdatorId},#{l.msCreatorId},#{l.msLastUpdatorId})
ON DUPLICATE KEY UPDATE timeRange=values(timeRange), remainHours=values(remainHours), workHour=values(workHour), msLastUpdatorId=values(msLastUpdatorId), lastUpdatorId=values(lastUpdatorId), lastUpdateTime=values(lastUpdateTime)
